description: Defines a Flutter widget 'NoteCard' that displays a note with its category, title, content, and last updated time, including delete functionality.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget illustrating the visual representation of a note, including category, title, content snippet, timestamp, and delete option.

methods.name: _formatTime
methods.description: Formats a timestamp in milliseconds into a human-readable date string.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying the note card with styled components.
